unnormalised: **EV Charging Gets a Boost, Mumbai Gets More Juice!**
normalised: **Electric Vehicle Charging Gets a Boost, Mumbai Gets More Juice!**

unnormalised: Hey auto enthusiasts! Remember that iconic scene from "Dil Chahta Hai" where they’re driving to Goa? Well, electric vehicles are making that trip a reality, but range anxiety is still a thing, right?
normalised: Hey auto enthusiasts! Remember that iconic scene from "Dil Chahta Hai" where they’re driving to Goa? Well, electric vehicles are making that trip a reality, but range anxiety is still a thing, right?

unnormalised: Good news from Mumbai! The BEST (Brihanmumbai Electric Supply and Transport) is seriously upping their EV charging game. They're adding a bunch of new charging stations across the city, including fast chargers near Dadar and Bandra.
normalised: Good news from Mumbai! The B E S T (Brihanmumbai Electric Supply and Transport) is seriously upping their Electric Vehicle charging game. They're adding a bunch of new charging stations across the city, including fast chargers near Dadar and Bandra.

unnormalised: Apparently, IIT Bombay is also in the mix, working on some cool new battery tech that promises faster charging times and longer ranges. They're aiming to reduce charging times to something reasonable, like grabbing a quick chai at a tapri!
normalised: Apparently, I I T Bombay is also in the mix, working on some cool new battery tech that promises faster charging times and longer ranges. They're aiming to reduce charging times to something reasonable, like grabbing a quick chai at a tapri!

unnormalised: These new stations will support all sorts of EVs, from Tata Nanos that have been converted to electric, to those fancy imported models. Expect to pay around Rs. 15-20 per unit.
normalised: These new stations will support all sorts of Electric Vehicles, from Tata Nanos that have been converted to electric, to those fancy imported models. Expect to pay around rupees fifteen to twenty per unit.

unnormalised: With more chargers popping up, those long-distance EV road trips are getting closer to being as carefree as those Bollywood classics made them seem. Think less "stranded in a dhaba" and more "smooth sailing on the expressway!" Drive safe, folks!
normalised: With more chargers popping up, those long-distance Electric Vehicle road trips are getting closer to being as carefree as those Bollywood classics made them seem. Think less "stranded in a dhaba" and more "smooth sailing on the expressway!" Drive safe, folks!
